map.title: Browse and Search for Minecraft Maps
map.blurb: Find amazing new Minecraft maps for your next adventure!
map.description: Minecraft maps are custom worlds created by players or developers that offer unique experiences beyond the standard game. These maps can range from simple parkour challenges to complex adventure stories, puzzle-solving quests, or even recreations of real-world locations. Since the early days of Minecraft, the community has embraced map-making as a form of creative expression, leading to a rich history of innovation and collaboration. Over the years, Minecraft maps have become a staple in the community, showcasing the limitless possibilities of the game and fostering a vibrant ecosystem of creators and players.

datapack.title: Browse and Search for Minecraft Data Packs
datapack.blurb: Find tools, challenges and more for your Minecraft adventures!
datapack.description: Minecraft data packs are essentially mods for vanilla Minecraft. They enhance gameplay by adding new features, mechanics, and experiences. They can transform the game with new challenges, quests, and even entirely new game modes. Since their introduction, data packs have become a beloved tool for creators, allowing the community to innovate and expand the possibilities of Minecraft, fostering a rich ecosystem of creativity and collaboration.

resourcepack.title: Browse and Search for Minecraft Resource Packs
resourcepack.blurb: Change up or enhance the look of Minecraft!
resourcepack.description: Minecraft resource packs are customizable collections of files that change the game's visuals and sounds, allowing players to personalize their gaming experience. They can modify textures, models, music, and sound effects, transforming the look and feel of the game. Since their introduction, resource packs have played a significant role in the Minecraft community, enabling creators to express their creativity and share their unique visions with others. Over the years, they have become a cornerstone of Minecraft's modding culture, fostering a vibrant community of artists and players who continually push the boundaries of what's possible in the game.

Navbar.maps_blurb: From puzzles to adventures to multiplayer madness.
Navbar.datapacks_blurb: Change your world, add a little challenge, or make a small tweak.
Navbar.resourcepacks_blurb: Explore a whole new world, or just add some new music.

no_tags.title: No Tags
no_tags.description: Content must have at least one tag

no_minecraft_version.title: No Minecraft Version
no_minecraft_version.description: Content must have a Minecraft version

no_creators.title: No Creators
no_creators.description: Content must have at least one creator

no_files.title: No Files
no_files.description: Content must have at least one file

no_images.title: No Images
no_images.description: Content is required to have at least one image.

short_description_too_short.title: Short Description Too Short
short_description_too_short.description: Your short description needs to be at least 40 characters

description_too_short.title: Description Too Short
description_too_short.description: Your description needs to be at least 100 characters

external_images.title: Images From External Sources
external_images.description: You have images that are from external sources. This means that MCCreations cannot guarantee they will continue to work in the future, or will be accessible by all users. We highly recommend you upload these images instead.

few_images.title: Very Few Images
few_images.description: More images help people get a better idea of what your content is about. It is recommended you upload at least 4 including your logo.

not_linked.title: Not Linked to an Account
not_linked.description: This content is not linked to an account on MCCreations. This means that your access to edit this content will expire in 24 hours. It is recommended to upload content with an account so you can retain access to all features.

no_download_link.title: No Download Link
no_download_link.description: At least one download link is required

slug_too_short.title: Slug Too Short
slug_too_short.description: Your slug needs to be at least 2 characters

Edit.title: Title
Edit.title_description: The primary name of your creation. Should be short and sweet!
Edit.slug_description: The unique identifier for your creation. This will be used in the URL, like mccreations.net/maps/your-slug
Edit.short_description_description: A short summary of your creation. This will be used in search results and previews.
Edit.video_url_description: A link to a video of your creation. This will replace your logo on the creation page with an embedded video.
Edit.description_description: A longer description of your creation. This will be used on the main page of your creation.

Tags.genre_description: The primary category of your creation. This gives users a very general idea of how your creation plays.
Tags.subgenre_description: The secondary category of your creation. This gives users a more specific idea of the contents of your creation.

Leaderboards.help: Learn how to setup MCCreations Leaderboards <link>here</link>. Note that leaderboards are only available for Java Edition at this time.
Leaderboards.title: Leaderboards
Leaderboards.message_text_description: Text to display to tell players to submit their score. This is sent in game when your creation ends.
Leaderboards.message_format_description: Extra formatting to add to the tellraw message. Should be formatted like "color":"green", "bold": true

Edit.translation_languages_description: Is your language missing? Click here to add it.

Metadata.title: Download Data Packs | MCCreations
Metadata.description: Download the best Data Packs for Minecraft. Explore the most popular Data Packs and get ready to play! Data Packs are the vanilla equivalent of mods for Minecraft. They can add new features, change the way the game is played, and more!
